comments.author: Scott Cytacki
comments.body: Jira messed up the text of the initial description formating, I edited the issue to try to avoid that problem.

comments.author: Scott Cytacki
comments.body: Jira still messed up the formating, here is another attempt to avoid that.

comments.author: angela
comments.body:
oh, a leftover from the move /trunk/contrib -> /sandbox.
it's fixed at revision 660830  

thanks for reporting.
angela

description:
the pom in sandbox/spi has the wrong scm url.
You can see the pom here:
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jackrabbit/sandbox/spi/pom.xml

It probably should be:
<scm>
    <connection>scm:svn:http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jackrabbit/sandbox/spi </connection>
    <developerConnection>scm:svn:https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jackrabbit/sandbox/spi </developerConnection>
    <url>http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/jackrabbit/sandbox/spi </url>
</scm>
summary: pom.xml in sandbox/spi has wrong scm url
